text: The following is a list of notable events and releases of the year 1924 in Norwegian music. ==Events== * Kringkastningselskapet A/S was founded. This was the predecessor to the Norwegian Broadcasting Corporation, established in 1933. ==Deaths== ; April * 12 – Sjur Helgeland, hardingfele fiddler and composer (born 1858). ==Births== ; June * 6 – Gunnar Brunvoll, impresario and opera administrator (died 1999). ; August * 23 – Edvard Fliflet Bræin, composer and conductor (died 1976). ; October * 18 – Egil Hovland, composer (died 2013). ==See also== * 1924 in Norway * Music of Norway ==References== Category:Norwegian music Norwegian Music Category:1920s in Norwegian music
title: 1924 in Norwegian music
